title: Paracanoeing at the 2016 Summer Paralympics – Women's KL1
text:
The <a href="Paracanoeing%20at%20the%202016%20Summer%20Paralympics">Canoe Sprint</a> women's <a href="KL1%20%28classification%29">KL1</a> event at the <a href="2016%20Paralympic%20Games">2016 Paralympic Games</a> took place on 14 and 15 September 2016, at the <a href="Lagoa%20Rodrigo%20de%20Freitas">Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas</a>. 
Two heats were held. Winners and runners up advanced directly to the final. The rest went into the semifinal, where the top four advanced to the final.
Heats.
Heat 1.
9:00 14 September 2016:
Heat 2.
